Documentation¶

Oops!¶

It seems this page is still under construction...

What to do?¶

This website is being built to guide beginners in the use of frbpoppy. If you’ve come this far - you must be an expert! If you arrived here wanting to dig deeper into frbpoppy, you might find the github repository to be of help. All code should be well documented, and if there’s something amiss, just open an issue or drop me a note!

frbpoppy

Fast Radio Burst Population Synthesis in Python
